summary: Mr. Wong and a girl reporter investigate a shipping magnate's murder.
cast: Boris Karloff|Marjorie Reynolds|Grant Withers|William Stelling|Catherine Craig|Guy Usher|Henry Brandon|Melvin Lang|Wilbur Mack|Kenneth Harlan|Richard Loo|Tristram Coffin|Mike Donovan|Gibson Gowland|Jack Kennedy|Maxine Leslie|Moy Ming|Angelo Rossitto|Bill Willmering
title: Sentenciado a muerte
